m_szDocTitle: Innova UEV to launch the Innova EV Car Share program at AASHE 2015 Conference & Expo ’Transforming
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Pinterest × BURR RIDGE, Ill., Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Themed "Transforming Sustainability Education," the Association for the Advancement of Sustainability in Higher Education (AASHE) 2015 Conference & Expo will be held in Minneapolis, Minnesota, on October 25–28. This conference is designed to help empower the higher education community to be a foundation for a thriving, equitable and ecologically healthy world while celebrating and inspiring campus sustainability innovations.
